DESCRIPTION: View all the tournaments on the server.
EXTENDED: **{{prefix}}tournaments** ~ Lists all tournaments on the server. [Click Here To Learn More](https://gamer.netlify.com/tournaments-feature)
INVALID: There was no tournament able to be found with the ID number you provided.
NEED_ID: I need an tournament ID to search for.
NONE: There were no tournaments found on this server. Please use the **tournamentcreate** command to make a new tournament.
